BLIST.TITLE: Archiving
BLIST.ITEM:
Switch on the archiving
OutilsOptions…
AutreArchivage automatique…
check Archiver ou supprimer les anciens éléments and Déplacer les anciens éléments vers
set the archive delay with Effacer les éléments plus anciens que
The default archive file is C:\Users\user\Documents\Outlook Files\Archive1.pst

It is possible to customize the archive configuration for a given folder
right click on the folderPropriétésArchivage automatique

It is possible to cancel the archive configuration customization of all folders
OutilsOptions…
AutreArchivage automatique…
click on Appliquer ces paramètres à tous les dossiers maintenant

BLIST.TITLE: To change the location of the archive file
BLIST.ITEM: stop Outlook
move the file on the file system
restart Outlook
click on the Dossier d’archivage folder
an error is displayed because Outlook cannot access the file, Outlook proposes to redefine the location of the file, do it
OutilsOptions… then AutreArchivage automatique… and define the file location in Déplacer les anciens éléments vers

cancel the archive configuration customization of all folders to avoid that some folders continue to be archived in the old file and reconfigure customization
(it would be better to write a macro to dump the configuration of each folder, so to be able to fix the obsolete ones)
